_header: In these words plus pi been contained
_description: Acrostic (Plus pi) on those not obligated to fast — one stanza rhyme royal commenting on ten lines of Latin preceding

BLLan762.First Lines: In thise wordes plus pi ben conteyned…
BLLan762.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.287.
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 161.
